projects.name: Data-Explorer
projects.description_eng: Application that allows the user upload, preprocess, explore, summarize and visualize a dataset  using a widget  without writing a single line of code. Also, the user can export the data filtered or the visualization

projects.name: Fulbright Association
projects.description_eng: Application that allows fulbright researchers around the world to connect by their research topics through an intuitive interface

projects.name: Accio Planner
projects.description_eng: Application that optimizes the number of semesters for students doing double major.  It merges the current state of two different undergraduate programs and generates a graph with the courses that should take each semester

projects.name: Academic Storage
projects.description_eng: Application that storages academic files. Cloud Storage with Amazon S3. Usability tests (Monkey tests, expert review, etc). Accessibility testing and Unit testing
